original_title: Futurama : Monster Robot Maniac Fun Collection
overview: Monster Robot Maniac Fun Collection is a single disc DVD collection released on 23 August, 2005. It contains four of the most acclaimed Futurama episodes (one from each of the seasons of the original run), hand-picked by the show's creators Matt Groening and David X. Cohen.
title: Futurama : Monster Robot Maniac Fun Collection
